common.selectScenario: Select a scenario to start learning about Indian road driving laws
common.noScenariosFound: No scenarios found matching your criteria.
common.question: Question

scenario-1.title: Traffic Signals and Right of Way
scenario-1.description: Learn about traffic signals, right of way rules, and intersection behavior according to Indian traffic laws.

scenario-2.title: Speed Limits and Overtaking
scenario-2.description: Understand speed limits in different zones and safe overtaking procedures as per Indian traffic regulations.

scenario-3.title: Parking Rules and Regulations
scenario-3.description: Master parking rules, no-parking zones, and penalties for parking violations in India.

scenario-4.title: Driving Under Influence and Penalties
scenario-4.description: Understand the legal blood alcohol limits, penalties for drunk driving, and related offenses.

scenario-5.title: Road Signs and Markings
scenario-5.description: Learn about various road signs, lane markings, and their meanings according to Indian traffic regulations.

scenario-6.title: Vehicle Documents and Registration
scenario-6.description: Understand vehicle registration, insurance, pollution certificates, and required documents for driving in India.

scenario-7.title: Two-Wheeler Specific Rules
scenario-7.description: Learn about special rules and regulations for motorcycles, scooters, and two-wheelers in India.

scenario-8.title: Highway and Expressway Rules
scenario-8.description: Learn about special rules, speed limits, and safety regulations for highways and expressways in India.

scenario-9.title: Pedestrian and Cyclist Rights
scenario-9.description: Understand the rights of pedestrians and cyclists, and how drivers should interact with them on Indian roads.

scenario-10.title: Lane Driving and Overtaking Rules
scenario-10.description: Master lane discipline, lane changing, and overtaking rules for city roads, highways, and expressways in India.
